message: Let's start with a fair split.  I'm happy to negotiate further if you think it's not quite right.
I'm looking for a bigger share, but willing to compromise.
Let's try a 50/50 split this time. We're both losing money with every round, so I think it's in our best interest to come to an agreement.
I'm still looking for a better deal, but willing to compromise on the lower end.
We're getting closer to the end.  Let's meet in the middle. I'll accept a 40/60 split, but we need to agree soon or we'll both lose out.
I'm not budging much, but I'm willing to give you a slightly smaller share to get this done.
We're running out of time!  I'm willing to take a smaller share to avoid getting nothing.  Let's do 30/70 and call it a day.
